verses.text: \w Deliver|strong="H5337"\w* me from mine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, O my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: \w defend|strong="H7682"\w* me from them that rise \w up|strong="H6965"\w* against me.\f + \fr 59.1 \ft Al-taschith…: or, Destroy not\f*\f + \fr 59.1 \ft Michtam: or, A golden Psalm\f*\f + \fr 59.1 \ft defend…: Heb. set me on high\f*
\w Deliver|strong="H5337"\w* me from the \w workers|strong="H6466"\w* of \w iniquity|strong="H0205"\w*, and \w save|strong="H3467"\w* me from \w bloody|strong="H1818"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w*.

For, lo, they lie in \w wait|strong="H0693"\w* for my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*: the \w mighty|strong="H5794"\w* are \w gathered|strong="H1481"\w* against me; not \add for\add* my \w transgression|strong="H6588"\w*, nor \add for\add* my \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

They \w run|strong="H7323"\w* and \w prepare|strong="H3559"\w* themselves without \add my\add* \w fault|strong="H5771"\w*: \w awake|strong="H5782"\w* to \w help|strong="H7125"\w* me, and \w behold|strong="H7200"\w*.\f + \fr 59.4 \ft help: Heb. meet\f*

Thou therefore, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w awake|strong="H6974"\w* to \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* all the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*: be not \w merciful|strong="H2603"\w* to any \w wicked|strong="H0205"\w* \w transgressors|strong="H0898"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.

They \w return|strong="H7725"\w* at \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*: they make a \w noise|strong="H1993"\w* like a \w dog|strong="H3611"\w*, and go round \w about|strong="H5437"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.

Behold, they belch \w out|strong="H5042"\w* with their \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*: \w swords|strong="H2719"\w* \add are\add* in their \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*: for who, \add say they\add*, doth \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*?
But thou, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, shalt \w laugh|strong="H7832"\w* at them; thou shalt have all the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w* in \w derision|strong="H3932"\w*.

\add Because of\add* his \w strength|strong="H5797"\w* will I \w wait|strong="H8104"\w* upon thee: for \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is\add* my \w defence|strong="H4869"\w*.\f + \fr 59.9 \ft defence: Heb. high place\f*

The \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of my \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* shall \w prevent|strong="H6923"\w* me: \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shall let me \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \add my desire\add* upon mine \w enemies|strong="H8324"\w*.\f + \fr 59.10 \ft enemies: Heb. observers\f*

\w Slay|strong="H2026"\w* them not, lest my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w forget|strong="H7911"\w*: \w scatter|strong="H5128"\w* them by thy \w power|strong="H2428"\w*; and bring them \w down|strong="H3381"\w*, O \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* our \w shield|strong="H4043"\w*.

\add For\add* the \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* of their \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \add and\add* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of their \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* let them even be \w taken|strong="H3920"\w* in their \w pride|strong="H1347"\w*: and for \w cursing|strong="H0423"\w* and \w lying|strong="H3585"\w* \add which\add* they \w speak|strong="H5608"\w*.

\w Consume|strong="H3615"\w* \add them\add* in \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w*, \w consume|strong="H3615"\w* \add them\add*, that they \add may\add* not \add be:\add* and let them \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w ruleth|strong="H4910"\w* in \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* unto the \w ends|strong="H0657"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.

And at \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* let them \w return|strong="H7725"\w*; \add and\add* let them make a \w noise|strong="H1993"\w* like a \w dog|strong="H3611"\w*, and go round \w about|strong="H5437"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.

Let them wander up and \w down|strong="H5128"\w* for \w meat|strong="H0398"\w*, and \w grudge|strong="H3885"\w* if they be not \w satisfied|strong="H7646"\w*.\f + \fr 59.15 \ft for meat: Heb. to eat\f*\f + \fr 59.15 \ft and grudge…: or, if they be not satisfied, then they will stay all night\f*

But I will \w sing|strong="H7891"\w* of thy \w power|strong="H5797"\w*; yea, I will sing \w aloud|strong="H7442"\w* of thy \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*: for thou hast been my \w defence|strong="H4869"\w* and \w refuge|strong="H4498"\w* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of my \w trouble|strong="H6862"\w*.

Unto thee, O my \w strength|strong="H5797"\w*, will I \w sing|strong="H2167"\w*: for \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is\add* my \w defence|strong="H4869"\w*, \add and\add* the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of my \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w*.
